articles.title: Even at 1-8, Boston College football shows signs of life, even in loss to nationally-ranked Notre Dame
articles.description:
Looking at the Boston College football team’s dreadful 1-8 start from afar, one might incorrectly assume that the Eagles have taken a beating every single week. While games against Pittsburgh and Clemson were massacres, they were outliers in a season where BC has come tantalizingly close so many times yet has been unable to seize […]
